# cwdata

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R build status](https://github.com/yliu0320/cwdata/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/yliu0320/cwdata/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of cwdata is to provide datasets and functions for use in the ETC5523 'Communicating with Data' course.

## Installation

The development version can be installed from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("yliu0320/cwdata")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(cwdata)
library(tibble)
key_crop_yields
n_countries(key_crop_yields)
```
